history: TTS !b Welcome to CMU Get Going. <break strength='strong'/> Your conversation will be recorded securely in order to help researchers improve voice-based assistants but your phone number will not be shared. <break strength='strong'/> By voluntarily continuing you confirm that you are 18 or older. <break time='1s'/> You are speaking to the ORANGE system. Please enter this into the survey immediately <break time='1s' />. </speak>
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER I would like driving directions.
TTS <speak> No problem. <break strength='strong' /> I will give you driving directions to your destination. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Where do you wanna go?
USER the airport
TTS Okay, going to pittsburgh international airport. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where do you want to leave from?
USER S
TTS Okay, leaving from pittsburgh. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When do you wanna travel?
USER Can you give me the directions?
TTS Okay, travelling at 10:56 am.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER No.
TTS <speak> Sounds good. <break strength='strong' /> Let me know if you didn't understand a step, and I'll repeat it for you. </speak>
TTS <speak> Just a minute. Let me look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 22 minutes.<break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Head northeast on Grant St toward Sixth avenuenue. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I move onto the next step? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Turn left at the 1st cross street onto Sixth avenuenue. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I move onto the next step? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Turn left onto William Penn Pl. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I move onto the next step? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Turn left onto Oliver avenue. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Are you ready for the next step? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Turn right at the 1st cross street onto Grant St. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Did you understand this step? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Take the ramp to I-376/Fort Pitt Bridge/Airport. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I move onto the next step? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Merge onto I-376 west. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Are you ready for the next step? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Keep left to stay on I-376 west. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Are you ready for the next step? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Take exit 53 toward Airport. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Are you ready for the next step? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> The final step <break strength='weak'/> is to Continue onto Airport Blvd. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Are you ready for the next step? </speak>
USER s
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Are you ready for the next step? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS Thank you for using CMU Get Going. If you would like to plan another trip, say <break strength='weak' /> RESTART.
USER Goodbye.
